purchase_complete_step.title: Your order is complete
purchase_complete_step.initial_order_complete_1st_paragraph_lab: A ticket has been assigned to you. To complete your additional ticket details, please click the "{button}" button.
purchase_complete_step.order_complete_1st_paragraph_label:
You may visit the "My Orders/Tickets" tab in the top right-hand corner of the navigation bar to
 assign/reassign tickets or to complete any required ticket details.
purchase_complete_step.initial_order_footer_label: If you wish to transfer your assigned ticket, close this window and visit the "My Orders/Tickets" tab in the top navigation bar.
purchase_complete_step.event_will_start_text: The event will start on {date} at {time} {time_zone_label}
